display_long_description:
# Slot Car VR - Mixed Reality Racing

Slot Car VR is a sandbox building and racing game, that allows you to transform your home into the ultimate racing track for you and others to enjoy. 

Bringing back the nostalgia and joy of slot car racing in your home, but this time it's even better! 

With limitless track and the ability to save, upload and race tracks with the community, your imagination is your only limitation!  


# CREATE
Intuitive track building tools allow you to create custom circuits with simple gestures. Full controller and hand tracking supported.
[media]

# CUSTOMIZE
Whether you are looking to recreate your favourite Formula One / NASCAR track, or craft something completely out of the ordinary; extensive libraries of props, special track pieces and structural items let you compliment any build with your desired look and feel.
[media]

# COLLABORATE
Co-located and global multiplayer. Play with others in your home, or race and build with friends at theirs.
[media]

# CHALLENGE
Win medals on global tracks. Beat the author and other players times to top the global leaderboards.
[media]

Available for Quest 3s, 3, 2 and Pro

Slot Car VR is a sandbox building and racing game, that allows you to transform your home into the ultimate racing track for you and others to enjoy. 

Bringing back the nostalgia and joy of slot car racing in your home, but this time it's even better! 

With limitless track and the ability to save, upload and race tracks with the community, your imagination is your only limitation!  


# CREATE
Intuitive track building tools allow you to create custom circuits with simple gestures. Full controller and hand tracking supported.

# CUSTOMIZE
Whether you are looking to recreate your favourite Formula One / NASCAR track, or craft something completely out of the ordinary; extensive libraries of props, special track pieces and structural items let you compliment any build with your desired look and feel.
